objects.description: [Industroyer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0001) uses the first COM port from the configuration file for the communication and the other two COM ports are opened to prevent other processes accessing them. This may block processes or operators from getting reporting messages from a device. (Citation: Anton Cherepanov, ESET June 2017)

external_references.description: Anton Cherepanov, ESET 2017, June 12 Win32/Industroyer: A new threat for industrial control systems Retrieved. 2017/09/15
